Uses of Interface
com.sun.jini.mahalo.log.ClientLog

  • Packages that use ClientLog 
    Package Description
    com.sun.jini.mahalo
    Provides implementations of the TransactionManager service.
    com.sun.jini.mahalo.log
    Utilities for managing Mahalo's recoverable log of transaction state.
